name: Hide_Labor_Ges_Columns
action:
<*DISALLOWATTRIBUTES(PAGA_Ad_GES%,PAGA_GES%)*><*CTX ( Container(PAGA_Labor_Container).Column(GES Eng).SetPermission(Hidden) )*><*CTX( Container(PAGA_Labor_Container).Column(GES Eng % Split).SetPermission(Hidden) )*><*CTX ( Container(PAGA_Labor_Container).Column(GES_Unit_Regional_Cost).SetPermission(Hidden) )*><*CTX ( Container(PAGA_Labor_Container).Column(GES_Regional_Cost).SetPermission(Hidden) )*><*CTX ( Container(PAGA_Labor_Container).Column(GES_ListPrice).SetPermission(Hidden) )*><*CTX ( Container(PAGA_Labor_Container).Column(GES_WTW_Cost).SetPermission(Hidden) )*><*CTX ( Container(PAGA_Labor_Container).Column(GES_MPA_Price).SetPermission(Hidden) )*>
<*CTX ( Container(PAGA_Additional_Labour_Container).Column(GES Eng).SetPermission(Hidden) )*><*CTX( Container(PAGA_Additional_Labour_Container).Column(GES Eng % Split).SetPermission(Hidden) )*><*CTX ( Container(PAGA_Additional_Labour_Container).Column(GES_Unit_Regional_Cost).SetPermission(Hidden) )*><*CTX ( Container(PAGA_Additional_Labour_Container).Column(GES_Regional_Cost).SetPermission(Hidden) )*><*CTX ( Container(PAGA_Additional_Labour_Container).Column(GES_ListPrice).SetPermission(Hidden) )*><*CTX ( Container(PAGA_Additional_Labour_Container).Column(GES_WTW_Cost).SetPermission(Hidden) )*><*CTX ( Container(PAGA_Additional_Labour_Container).Column(GES_MPA_Price).SetPermission(Hidden) )*>
